risks.title: Cascading procurement and contractual delays impact infrastructure rollout
risks.description: Late FA, staggered sub-orders, separate ICT contracting, and vendor capacity gaps caused sequential bottlenecks, delaying Phase I to Q3–Q4 2025 and Phase II to mid-2026.

risks.title: Phase II scope expansion and cost increase due to electricity constraints
risks.description: Phase II scope expanded by ~76% (USD 322,342) due to unforeseen electricity/infrastructure needs and site-specific complexities, creating budget pressure.

risks.title: Municipal governance and site instability (Abobo confirmation; Grand-Bassam site change)
risks.description: Abobo mayoral letter pending and Grand-Bassam site change require rework and create approval dependencies and timeline risks.

risks.title: Limited internet coverage undermines LMS-dependent delivery
risks.description: Connectivity gaps at centers threaten e-learning delivery, monitoring, and learner engagement; offline mode needed as backup.

risks.title: Trainer recruitment and ToT completion gaps (basic ICT & green practices)
risks.description: 3 trainers unrecruited; 16 missing ICT pedagogy; 81 trainers not completing online modules, delaying rollout and affecting quality.

risks.title: Advanced ToT recruitment/certification delays constrain ICT Academy rollout
risks.description: Only 8/19 advanced trainers completed online modules by Dec 2025; remaining depend on center readiness and upcoming in-person ToT.

risks.title: Enrollment and beneficiary target shortfall due to 2025 delays
risks.description: Unrecoverable 2025 time loss and capacity reductions cap total delivery (~33.9% without mitigation; ~63.8% with max mitigation).

risks.title: Greenpreneur promotional and participation shortfalls
risks.description: Only 8/15 promotions and 112/225 participants due to compressed timelines and early QA gaps; pipeline and rigor affected.

risks.title: Sub-national participation gaps
risks.description: Regional applications (42 total) far below Abidjan (120), reflecting limited awareness and compressed outreach.

risks.title: Pitch competition and mentorship timeline delays
risks.description: Competition moved to Q1 2026 due to cohort delays and election-period uncertainties; mentorship timeline compressed.

risks.title: Fund establishment and disbursement delays
risks.description: Greenpreneur Fund not established in 2025; pitch delay shifts USD 100k disbursement to March 2026.

risks.title: Leadership Academy and study tour scheduling constraints
risks.description: Academy postponed to 2026 for calendar alignment; study tour shifted to late March 2026.

risks.title: Data integrity risks from offline workarounds
risks.description: Offline capture and later sync increase human-error risk affecting attendance/completion verification and reporting timeliness.

risks.title: Advanced modules mastery gaps (Green Technologies & Green Business)
risks.description: Lower mastery/confidence in sustainability modules observed in pilot; risk of uneven learning outcomes across cohorts.

risks.title: iOS hardware constraints limit practical iOS training
risks.description: Mac/Xcode unavailability prevents practical iOS assignments; scope adapted to conceptual iOS + Android practicals.

risks.title: Restrictive prerequisites (coding) limit intake diversity
risks.description: Coding prerequisite excludes strong design/business profiles and may reduce women’s participation and total intake.

risks.title: Funder interest may not convert to near-term investment
risks.description: Most funders’ interest is contingent on market-ready pipeline and post-pitch due diligence; conversion lag likely.

risks.title: Online-only networking limits relationship depth
risks.description: Online-first format limited spontaneous, in-person connections despite higher accessibility for regions.

risks.title: Policy review and ecosystem mapping study delays
risks.description: Consultant procurement delays shifted studies to 2026 fieldwork; final reports due May 2026.
